links: Gheorghe Coserea, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = T(n, floor(n/2)), where T(n,g) is defined by A035309. - _Gheorghe Coserea_, Mar 18 2016
prog: (PARI)N = 20; F = 1; gmax(n) = n\2;Q = matrix(N + 1, N + 1);Qget(n, g) = { if (g < 0 || g > n/2, 0, Q[n+1, g+1]) };Qset(n, g, v) = { Q[n+1, g+1] = v };Quadric({x=1}) = {  Qset(0, 0, x);  for (n = 1, length(Q)-1, for (g = 0, gmax(n),    my(t1 = (1+x)*(2*n-1)/3 * Qget(n-1, g),       t2 = (2*n-3)*(2*n-2)*(2*n-1)/12 * Qget(n-2, g-1),       t3 = 1/2 * sum(k = 1, n-1, sum(i = 0, g,       (2*k-1) * (2*(n-k)-1) * Qget(k-1, i) * Qget(n-k-1, g-i))));    Qset(n, g, (t1 + t2 + t3) * 6/(n+1))));};Quadric('x + O('x^(F+1)));v = vector(N+2-F, n, vector(1 + gmax(n-1), g, polcoeff(Qget(n+F-2, g-1), F)));apply(x->x[#x], v) \\ _Gheorghe Coserea_, Mar 17 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
